entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 23 April 2023
